Class ReferralPathFinder

java.lang.Object
ReferralPathFinder
public class ReferralPathFinder extends Object
Class used to find referral paths from a starting student to a specific company

  • Method Details

    • findReferralPath

      public List<UniversityStudent> findReferralPath(UniversityStudent start, String targetCompany)
      Finds the shortest referral path from the start student to a student who works at the target company.
      Parameters:
      start - student to start the search from
      targetCompany - company to find a referral path to
      Returns:
      list of students representing the referral path, or an empty list if no path is found

    • buildPath

      private List<UniversityStudent> buildPath(Map<UniversityStudent,UniversityStudent> previous, UniversityStudent target)
      Builds the path from the start student to the target student
      Parameters:
      previous - map of previous nodes for path reconstruction
      target - the target student
      Returns:
      list of students representing the path

    • printReferralPath

      public void printReferralPath(List<UniversityStudent> path, String targetCompany)
      Prints the referral path from the start student to the target company
      Parameters:
      path - list of UniversityStudents representing the referral path
